name: ConsoleRenderTest
description: Unit tests for the ConsoleRender class, which handles rendering of OpenAPI diff results to the console.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenPropertyHasBeenRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when a property has been removed from the OpenAPI spec.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenHTTPStatusCodeIsRange
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when an HTTP status code is a range in the OpenAPI spec.

test_cases.name: renderShowsWhatsDeletedSectionWhenEndpointIsDeleted
test_cases.description: Tests that the 'What's Deleted' section is shown when an endpoint is deleted from the OpenAPI spec.

test_cases.name: renderShowsWhatsNewSectionWhenEndpointIsAdded
test_cases.description: Tests that the 'What's New' section is shown when a new endpoint is added to the OpenAPI spec.

test_cases.name: renderShowsWhatsDeprecatedSectionWhenEndpointIsDeprecated
test_cases.description: Tests that the 'What's Deprecated' section is shown when an endpoint is deprecated in the OpenAPI spec.

test_cases.name: renderShowsWhatsChangedSectionWithCorrectFormattingWhenEndpointIsChanged
test_cases.description: Tests that the 'What's Changed' section is shown with correct formatting when an endpoint is changed in the OpenAPI spec.
